main-goal: You are playing Diplomacy, a strategy board game. Your objective is to win by controlling 18 or more supply centres.

instructions: Choose legal DATC orders. Respond **only** with a JSON array of order strings. Return an array of DATC order(s) for each of *your* units. Units without orders will hold. You may support or convoy other powers' units, but consider your strategic goals first.
